TopicTitle: How to re-map debug toolbar hot key

Articles.Content: I can no longer use Alt+F12 as my hotkey for the debug menu as F12 also being my scroll lock key. For some reason it over-writes the default action of the F12 key to scroll lock instead. Is there any way to manually change the debug menu hot key?
As far as I know its not possible - its not in the cfg file as a configurable key. Sorry
